extendedInfo.description: Free, live flight tracker and flight status app from FlightAware for Android!This app allows you to track the real-time flight status and see the live map flight track of any commercial flight worldwide and general aviation (private, charter, etc) in the United States and Canada.Track by aircraft registration, route, airline, flight number, city pair, or airport code. Tracking data includes complete flight details and full-screen maps with NEXRAD radar overlay.Receive real-time push notification flight alerts, view airport delays, see nearby flights (in the sky overhead), and more!We're excited to be in the Android Market and expect to make many releases in the coming days and weeks.Please send your feedback to support-android@flightaware.com

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: This is a great app Easy to use multiple ways to alert. You can see when your friends are flying there airplanes And my wife can keep track of me when I fly
reviews.author: Robert Foster

reviews.title: Dates and map are messed up.
reviews.comment: The dates for my flight alerts do not sync correctly with the alerts I enter on the web and I cannot correct the dates on my phone.  For example, if I enter manually June 14, 2013 on the phone, it gets recorded as 7/14/13.  Then when I reopen the date dialog, it populates as Oct 6, 2018 and the dials show Jan 01 1900.  Also, the application \"unexpectedly stops\" every time I touch the map in the My Aircraft window to zoom or pan the map. Used to be a pretty good app prior to this.
reviews.author: John Kelly

reviews.title: Awesome flight tracker
reviews.comment: My favorite flight status website now has a much improved app! Screens load so much faster, and maps are smooth now. Great work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool app but has some bugs
reviews.comment: This is a really cool app and has been useful for tracking flight departure and arrival times, but the Alerts function has some bugs. For example, it\'s impossible to set the date correctly for a Single Day alert. Fix the bugs, and I would rate this a 5-star app.
reviews.author: Michael O\'Shaughnessy

reviews.title: awsome!
reviews.comment: maybe time zone conversions for the arrivals/departure hours and other unit measures (ft->m) would be nice. my fav function is the map live tracking of the flight!
reviews.author: Filip Tudic

reviews.title: Pilot and aircraft mech totally satisfied!
reviews.comment: This is way useful for my line of work! Map colors are awesome and the radar overlay is really cool too! I showed off the app when we landed on a commercial flight to other passengers and they were really impressed!
reviews.author: Aaron Stigall

reviews.title: Needs much improvement.
reviews.comment: The radar image overlay is never accurate on startup. I\'ve seen images from weeks prior load. Occasionaly when you zoom in on your route, an updated radar image may show up. This app is not recommended for pilot route planning.
reviews.author: redsky084

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: I\'ve used the website for a year, am new to the app. I agree with some of the other reviews that it isn\'t perfect, but the developer had been amenable to suggestion. I\'m hoping the next update corrects most if these issues. Overall I\'m still quite pleased with it.
reviews.author: Bill Stuhl

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Enjoyed this app so much as my family traveled out of the country. Ty for giving me peace of mind ..  :)
reviews.author: Lisa Merry

reviews.title: Flight Aware
reviews.comment: Let\'s just put it this way, in the Limousine industry, Flight Aware delivers results and it\'s the best flight tracker hands down! To the Flight Aware Team, please Keep up the great work, and Thanks for making our Limo industry feel more at ease!
reviews.author: Patrick Guadagnino

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Very impressed! But on nearby flight map (planes around me) its show multiple icons of the same flight number and airline and not just 1.
reviews.author: Ezra Bowers

reviews.title: Good app with a few problems
reviews.comment: Lots of great features. Would be 5 stars if they fix a few things. Alerts are \"buggy.\" Love the \"nearby me\" map, but the weather radar overlay is always displayed with old data.
reviews.author: Kirk Lauterbach

reviews.title: Keeps crashing in view map
reviews.comment: App crashes every time i launch the map mode.. not sure why. Its very frustrating though..
reviews.author: Pod Cel

reviews.title: Great & Easy to Use!
reviews.comment: I am very happy at the ease of use, searches, and cross references. People can be automatically updated, and ypu can keep track of individual fligjts, planes, and airports simultaneously. A plethora of choices and abilities.
reviews.author: David McKinzie

reviews.title: Great features but buggy
reviews.comment: I wanted to like this; I\'m a pilot so I was enthusiastic about the extra features like flight routes, etc. But when I tried to use the basic function to track a flight my wife was on, I ran into some show stopping bugs. I added alerts for departure and later discovered the date was wrong (it picked the day before I created the alert). Later I tested it and the date dialog is so buggy that I could not get an alert added \"today\" no matter what. Going back to another app until this is fixed, if ever.
reviews.author: Blandon Ray

reviews.comment: Extremely easy to use. Tracks transfer flights, and stores saved itineraries etc. Highly recommend this app, especially gor frequent flyers.
reviews.author: Christopher Hager

reviews.title: Shows flights from 2012
reviews.comment: I entered the current flight no. but it keeps showing me flights for the same no. that happened in 2012. I know the flight departed today.  If you want to see old flights information from a year ago, and not your current flight, then this would be good.
reviews.author: Henri Leung

reviews.title: Can not find flightnr
reviews.comment: Looks like a nice app but it is impossible to find a flight if you only have a flightnumber. For some dumb reason you must enter the airline name and often you only have the nr (which by the way contains the airline acronime). To bad but this way it is useless
reviews.author: Maarten Munnik

reviews.title: Very helpful
reviews.comment: I work on the ramp for Swissport at HNL. I use this app to keep track of the Freighter flights and have never been let down on information. ETA, ETD, Delays, makes my life (and sleep schedule) way easier to manage.  Only complaint is that sometimes I\'ll get a \"Check connectivity\" message, when my internet is clearly working.  Other than that, great app.
reviews.author: Ty Otsuka

reviews.title: Last update sucks
reviews.comment: Since the last update, the map sucks. When you refresh the map on \'nearby me\' it shows where the plane was and where it is currently, essentially duplicating itself many times over. If you live in a place where there is tons of traffic then pretty much you get a sea of planes on the screen. Fix the dups or let me uninstall and reinstall the last version instead. Using a sammy s3
reviews.author: Seth A.
